translations: adj.不可原谅的；不可宽恕的

phrs.translation: 不可原谅的, 不可宽恕的

sentences.sentence: I hope not so. Imprudence or thoughtlessness in money matters would be unpardonable in me.
sentences.translation: 但愿不会如此。我要是在银钱问题上粗心大意，那是不可原谅的。

sentences.sentence: Euthanasia is a special kind of unpardonable crime in the name of charity, guilty up to the hilt!
sentences.translation: 安乐死其实是一种特殊的在仁爱名义下从事的彻头彻尾的不能饶恕的罪恶。
